abstract: The move by Blackstone matches a trend by private equity firms that are cashing in on their portfolio companies while the stock markets are rallying.
snippet: The move by Blackstone matches a trend by private equity firms that are cashing in on their portfolio companies while the stock markets are rallying.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 8:10 p.m. | As private equity firms rush to cash in on their investments, the Blackstone Group is moving to sell one of the biggest companies to go private in recent years.

headline.main: Blackstone Is Expected to Sell Hilton in I.P.O.
headline.print_headline: Blackstone Is Expected To Sell Hilton In an Offering

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
